_meanings:
{@--1@}
Complete comprehension or 
inclusion; one of the senses of the 
particle {#A; AN maryAdABiviDyoH#}  
<ls>P. II. 1. 13</ls>, the limit {%inceptive%} as opposed to
the limit {%conclusive%} and translated
by ‘from,’ ‘commencing with’,
‘including’; as in 
{#AbAlaM-AbAleByaH hariBaktiH#} ({#maryAdA#} and {#aBiviDi#} are thus
distinguished {#tena vinA maryAdA#}, 
{#tatsahito'BiviDiH#}).

{@--2@} Complete pervasion, 
filling up or occupying completely;
{#aBiviDO BAva inuR#} <ls>P. III. 3. 44</ls>; also
<ls>V. 4. 53</ls> and <ls>Sk.</ls> thereon.
